_sText:
This is my remake of de_rats3_vs.  I redid it from scratch for the Source engine.  It was designed for a gravity setting of 200.

Text file:

Rats3_Crzy - Bomb / Defuse
By: {NOC}Crazy (noc_crazy@yahoo.com)

Bomb Site: UFO 

* THIS MAP WAS DESIGNED FOR GRAVITY SETTING OF 200!
* This map was modeled after my all-time favorite CS map, de_rats3_v2.  
* Special thanks to {NOC}Peritus for the graphics and problem solving skills.
